name: Opinion Paper
structure: Abstract + Introduction + Main Arguments + Implications + Conclusion
content_guidelines: Write a 150-200 word abstract summarizing your position
Introduce the topic and state your thesis clearly
Present main arguments supported by the research data
Discuss implications for the field or society
Conclude with future directions or recommendations
Maintain scholarly tone while being accessible
prompt_template: Write an opinion paper that presents a clear position on the research topic, supported by evidence from the data. {user_instructions}
style_guidelines: Academic but accessible, well-structured, evidence-based, factually accurate
